description: This Dart file contains testing utilities for Flutter widget testing, including a custom HttpOverrides class, a widget pump method with theme setup, and helper functions for interacting with BottomNavigationBar items and TextFields during tests.

classes.name: _TestHttpOverrides
classes.description: A custom HttpOverrides class used to prevent real network calls during tests by overriding HttpOverrides.

methods.name: pumpThemedWidget
methods.description: Pumps a widget wrapped in a MaterialApp with a custom theme into the WidgetTester, setting up HttpOverrides and ensuring animations and microtasks settle for isolated widget testing.

methods.name: tapBottomNavItem
methods.description: Finds a BottomNavigationBar item by its label and taps it, then waits for the UI to settle.

methods.name: enterTextByHint
methods.description: Finds a TextField by its hint text, enters the provided text, and waits for the UI to settle, accommodating debounce or async queries.
